Translations.Text: Ccekoan i Oebbi, i iIan i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. I Neppa, ccekoan di laxert. Neppa, d Bab n uuwab, Ippuxebbeo
Ieoa ayen ikeccmen di tmurt, ayen id iteff$en segs, ayen id iprusun seg igenni, ayen ippalin $uoes. Neppa Ipeunu, Ipsemmie

Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur a$ d ippas yimir". Ini: "xaii, s Mass iw, ara kwen id ias"! Amusnaw n tbavnit, ur idrig fellaS ubruy ubelkim, ama deg igenwan, ama di ddunit; ama seddaw wannect is, ama sennig es; akw, di Tezmamt ipbegginen
Ad Ikafi wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan. I wigi, ssmae akked ooeeq ukyis
Wid ikkaten deg issekniyen nne£, sfunnugen, widak, fellasen aaaqeb n twa$it taqeoeant
Wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni, walan ar ayen id irsen $uoek, s$uo Mass ik, d tidep. Ippawi s abrid n Uzmir, Amaazuz
Nnan wid ijehlen: "day ad awen nessken argaz, ar awen d yinin ar ma teftutsem, yal aftutes, i kunwi lxelq amaynut
Iger ed tikerkas $ef Oebbi, ne$ d aoehbani"? Xaii, wid ur numin ara s laxeot, haaten deg uaaqeb, akked ttelfan u$miq

Day ur walan ara ayen illan zdat sen, u deffir sen, di tmurt akked igenwan? Ma ihwa ya£, a ten Nger seddaw tmurt, ne$ a d Nesse$li fellasen igezzim seg igenni. Deg wayagi, ih, d assekni i yal amdan ucaif
Ni$ Nefka s$uone£ lfevl i Dawed. A yidurar, alset yides akked ifrax. Nerra yas uzzal d aleqqaq
Eunaa tibedaiyin n wuzzal, qiss tindar. Xeddmet ayen ilhan. Nek, Pwali$ ayen txeddmem
I Sliman: avu. Win n uubee, aggur; win n tmeddit, aggur. Nelli yas taawint n nneas. Kra n leonun ad xedmen fellas, s tsrie n Mass is. Win degsen, iveofen i lameo nne£, Nessukk fellas, aaaqeb ujajie
Xeddmen as ayen ib$a: leowamaa, tiaancuoin, loefnat am ievunen, ticcuytin iqaaden. Exdem s tnemmirt, a tawacult n Dawed, drus n yimdanen iW i isnemmiren
Mi Nseyya fellas tameppant, ur as faqen ara immut, armi icca taakwazt is, ubaaauc n wakal. Mi i$li, eulfan leonun ar, lemmer day ssinen tabavnit, ur qqimen deg uaaqeb isdullun
Ni$, i Saba, assekni di tnezdu$in nnsen. Snat tebeirin, ta yeffus, ta zelmev. Eccet si l$it n Mass nnwen, u snemmret aS. Tamurt ilhan, Mass Ipsemmieen
Wexxoen. Nuzen asen aeemmal n Aarim. Tibeirin nnsen, nerra tent d tibeirin id ippaken l$ella oeagen, tammemayt, akked tzegwart taxeiiayt
Akka ay ten Nqeiii $ef tijehli nnsen. Day a Nqeiii wur nejhil
Nerra garasen u ger temdinin i$ef Nburek, timdinin id ivehoen. Nektal tikli garasent: "mereet degsent di laman, am yiv, am ass
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! Zzi$wzef tallit ger zziaoat nne$"! Densen iman nnsen. Nerra ten d tiquivin. Nesqucc iten wakali. Ih, deg wayagi, war ccek, d issekniyen i yal aueboi isnemmiren
Ni$ Iblis itebbet ed, segsen, ameyyez is. Vefoen t, siwa arbaa si lmumnin
Ur isai kra udabu fellasen. Iwakken kan, a Nissin anwa iumnen s laxeot, u anwa i illan, fellas, di ccekk. Mass ik Ipearab af yal cci
Ini: "naaret wid i tepkabarem, war Oebbi. Ur sain taeeyt ubelkim, deg igenwan ne$ di tmurt; ur criken degsen; ur aS illi, garasen, umaiwen
Cafuaa, s$uoeS, tenfaa kan win iwumi ip Irad. Alamma, ma tekkes tugdi seg wulawen nnsen, a d inin: "acu id Inna, Mass nnwen"? A d inin: "d tidep, u Neppa d Aalayen, d Ameqwoan
Ini: "anwa ikwen ip$aten, si tmurt akked igenwan"? Ini: "d Oebbi". Nekwni am kunwi, amendeo ma nella di nnhaya, ne$ di ttelfan n uuee
Ini: "ur teppuqeiiim $ef wayen nfalia, ur neppuqeiii $ef wayen txeddmem
Ini: "ad a$ Issemlil Mass nne$, sinna, ad Ieudd garane$, s tidep. Neppa d Ameaddi Amusnaw
Ini: "sseknet iyi d wid i tqeonem $uoeS, d icriken"! Xaii, Neppa d Oebbi Uzmir, Bab n uuwab
Ur k id Nuzen, i imdanen, armi d uqnia; a pbecooev, a pnedoev. Maca, tegwti n yimdanen, ur ssinen
Qqaoen: "melmi lemaahda agi, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "$uowen ppaaud ass, ur tezmirem a t teswexxoem, ne$ a t id tesqeobem, s saaa

Nnan wid ijehlen: "ur neppamen, d awez$i, s Leqwoan agi, ne$ s wayen it id izwaren". Lemmer a pwaliv mara bedden imednas, ar Mass nnsen, pmeslayen garasen. Ad inin uohifen i imzuxiyen: "lemmer macci d kunwi, yili nella d lmumnin
Ad inin imzuxiyen i uohifen: "day d nekwni ikwen isfeo$en af nnhaya, mi kwen id iusa? Xaii, tellam d ibe$wviyen

Ad inin uohifen, i imzuxiyen: "xaii! Nncub, iv akked wass, mi teeppmem, fellane$, a nagwi Oebbi, u ad aS negg tanudda". Ffren nndama mi walan aaaqeb. Nerra tiqwlavin $ef imegoav n wid ijehlen. Day ara ppuqeiiin $ef wayen ur xdimen
Ur Nuzen ara kra uneddao ar temdint, mebla ma nnan imeokantiyen is: "nekwni, ih, nugwi ayen is id teppuceggaam
Nnan: "nekwni, n$elb ik ayla, tarwa. Ur nelli d wid ara ippuqeiiin
Ini: "ihi Mass iw Ip$iti win i S ihwan u Iwezzen; maca, tegwti n imdanen, ur ssinen
Macci d ayla nnwen, ne$ d tarwa nnwen, ara kwen id ieeieen nezzeh $uone£, siwa wid iumnen, ixedmen ayen ilhan. I nitni arraz berdayen, ilmend n wayen xedmen. Ad ilin, di laman, di t$uofatin
Ma d wid ikkaten deg issekniyen nne£, sfunnugen, widak a d rsen i uaaqeb
Ini: "ih, Mass iw Ip$iti win i S ihwan, deg imdanen iS. Iwezzen as. Ayen akw ara tefkem n cci, ad awen t id Irr. Neppa, Yif akw im$iten
Ass ideg ara ten Ifser, akken ma llan, imiren ad Yini i lmalayek: "wigi, day llan aabden kwent
A d inint: "gedha s yiseK! D Kecc ay d Bab nne$, war nitni. Xaii, llan aabden leonun. Tegwti degsen umnen yissen
Assa, ur imlik yiwen i wayev, segwen, aba$uo ne$ ccqa. A Nini i wid idensen: "jeoobet aaaqeb n tmes, i tellam tnekoem t

Ma $oan asen issekniyen nne£ ipbegginen, ad inin: "wagi d argaz kan, i ib$an a kwen istixeo, seg wayen llan aabden imezwura nnwen". Ad inin: "ayagi, siwa d tikerkas id innulfan". Wid ijehlen i tidep, mi ten id tusa, ad inin: "ayagi d sseur n uuee kan
Ur asen Nefki tizmamin, ara lemden; ur asen d Nuzen, uqbel ik, aneddao
Skaddben wid i ten id izwaren. Ur asen tebbwiv ara tis mraw n wayen i ippunefken mi skaddben imazanen iW. A tuzzma W, imiren
Ini: "ar yiwet kan, ara kwen nabi$: a pbeddem zdat Oebbi, di sin, ne$ weeeedwen; sinna, a d tesmektim. Ameddakwel nnwen ur illi d aoehbani. Neppa d aneddao nnwen kan, uqbel aaaqeb uqsie
Ini: "ur awen ssutre$ kra n teqdiat; apan nnwen. Ih, taqdiat iw, ar Oebbi kan. Neppa, $ef yal cci, d Anagi
Ini: "ih, Mass iw Ipqeddim tidep, d Amusnaw n tbavnit
Ini: "tusa d tidep, ur d nezzunt tkerkas, ur d ppalsent
Ini: "ma nnetlafe$, nnetlafe$ kan i iman iw. Ma pwanha$, d ayen iyi d Iweeea Mass iw. Neppa, ih, d Aqoib, Isell
Lemmer a pwaliv mi xelaan, tarewla ur telli. Pwaiifen, si tama iqeoben
Nnan: "numen yis". Amek ara d ssiwven, si tama ibaaden
Ni$ llan zik, nekoen t. Rran akin tabavnit, si tama ibaaden
Ad yili ufuil, garasen d wayen ctaqen, akken tevoa, zik, d wid i ten icban. Ih, nitni llan di ccekk imcebbwel
